column1:
T
his  appeal  is  from the  judgment, delivered by  the  learned  Judge of the  High  Court  of  Chilaw,
dated 28.09.2016, by which, the accused-appellant, who is before this Court, was convicted and
sentenced to death for having murdered Ushettige Aladin Peter Appuhami (the deceased), and
committing the offence of Murder under section 296 of the Penal Code.
The charge in the indictment is as follows;
